get.description: Find movies using over 30 filters and sort options.

parameters.name: certification
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `region`

parameters.name: certification.gte
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `region`

parameters.name: certification.lte
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `region`

parameters.name: certification_country
parameters.description: use in conjunction with the `certification`, `certification.gte` and `certification.lte` filters

parameters.name: watch_region
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `with_watch_monetization_types ` or `with_watch_providers `

parameters.name: with_cast
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_companies
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_crew
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_genres
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_keywords
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_people
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_release_type
parameters.description: possible values are: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query, can be used in conjunction with `region`

parameters.name: with_watch_monetization_types
parameters.description: possible values are: [flatrate, free, ads, rent, buy] use in conjunction with `watch_region`, can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_watch_providers
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `watch_region`, can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

overview.example: Super-Hero partners Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne, along with with Hope's parents Janet van Dyne and Hank Pym, and Scott's daughter Cassie Lang, find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that will push them beyond the limits of what they thought possible.

get.description: Find TV shows using over 30 filters and sort options.

parameters.name: watch_region
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `with_watch_monetization_types ` or `with_watch_providers `

parameters.name: with_companies
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_genres
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_keywords
parameters.description: can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_status
parameters.description: possible values are: [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_watch_monetization_types
parameters.description: possible values are: [flatrate, free, ads, rent, buy] use in conjunction with `watch_region`, can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_watch_providers
parameters.description: use in conjunction with `watch_region`, can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

parameters.name: with_type
parameters.description: possible values are: [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], can be a comma (`AND`) or pipe (`OR`) separated query

overview.example: To exact vengeance, a young woman infiltrates the household of an influential family as a housemaid to expose their dirty secrets. However, love will get in the way of her revenge plot.

get.description: Get the list of official genres for TV shows.
